abstract: California prosecutors say they will try to block Gov Jerry Brown's ballot initiative proposal to reduce state's prison population.
lead_paragraph: The prosecutors said that they were seeking to block Gov. Jerry Brown’s proposed ballot initiative to reduce the state’s prison population.

headline.main: California: Prosecutors Seek to Derail Prison Initiative
headline.print_headline: California: Prosecutors Seek to Derail Prison Initiative

snippet: The prosecutors said that they were seeking to block Gov. Jerry Brown’s proposed ballot initiative to reduce the state’s prison population.
